title: Wall Ball Fundamentals
description: Master the fundamentals of wall ball to develop stick skills and hand-eye coordination.
content:
Mastering Wall Ball

Wall ball is one of the most important drills for developing stick skills and hand-eye coordination. Here are the fundamentals:

Proper Form

  • Stand 5-10 feet from the wall
  • Keep your top hand near the head of the stick
  • Use your bottom hand to control the stick
  • Snap your wrists on each throw

Daily Routine

Start with 10 minutes and gradually increase to 20 minutes. Focus on:

  1. Right-handed throws (5 minutes)
  2. Left-handed throws (5 minutes)
  3. Quick stick (5 minutes)
  4. Behind the back (5 minutes)

Tips for Success

Consistency is key! Practice at the same time each day to build a habit. Track your progress and challenge yourself to improve each week.
